title: Muthal murai unnai Lyrics Thulli Ezhunthathu Kadhal Songs lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: BOBO Shashi
Song: Muthal Murai Unnai
Lyrics : Saka Senthilkumar

Movie: Thulli Ezhunthathu Kadhal
Music: BOBO Shashi

Muthal murai unnai ninaithu
en kangal azhuginrathe..azhuginrathe
Adhu natpu enru therindhum
en nenjam marukinradhe..marukinradhe
Thanimayil intha thanimayil
un mathipinai therinthu konden
Ulagathil en ulagathil
un velicham elandhu ninren

Vidaigalae illaa vidukadhai pol
kaadhalukum vilakkam kidaiyaadhe
Udalai uyir vittu pirindhaalum
ninaivugal endrenrum aliyaathe
Kaadhal enra bodhaiyile
oodalgal koodalgal irandum undu
Natpu enra paathaiyile
athil varuthamum valigalum marapathundu

Muthal murai unnai ninaithu
en kangal azhuginrathe
Adhu natpu enru therindhum
en nenjam marukinradhe

Alaiyaai karaiyai thaedi vandhaal
kalangiya kangalai yaar thudaipaar
kanalaai kodhikum nerupinai pol
karugiya ivan kathai yaar mudithaar
Desam thaandi paranthaalum
paravaigal paasathai marapathillai
kaneer vittu azhudhaalum
kadal meengalin sogangal therivathillai
category: Song:Muthal murai unnai - Thulli Ezhunthathu Kadhal
